meanings.definition: A feeling that binds one to a person, thing, cause, ideal, or the like.
meanings.sent1: Her strong attachments to her family make her always want to be close to them.
meanings.sent2: The child's attachment to his favorite toy is heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: His attachment to his lucky socks is quite amusing to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The attachment she felt towards her homeland was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The deep attachment he had for his childhood home was evident in his stories.

meanings.sent1: The backpack had multiple attachments for extra storage.
meanings.sent2: The camera came with various attachments for different lenses.
meanings.sent3: The attachment of a cup holder to a bicycle may seem odd but is quite useful.
meanings.sent4: The attachments on the vacuum cleaner made cleaning the stairs much easier.
meanings.sent5: The attachments on the Swiss Army knife were incredibly versatile.

meanings.definition: A document or file that is sent with an email.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to include all necessary attachments when sending the report.
meanings.sent2: The email had an attachment with the meeting agenda.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting to attach the file as an attachment to the email was a common mistake.
meanings.sent4: The attachment contained important information for the project.
meanings.sent5: The attachment was a PDF document with detailed instructions.
